articles.title: Found gross negligence by Byju's auditors: ICAI president - The Economic Times
articles.description: ICAI found gross negligence by auditors of Byju's. FRRB will review the conduct of auditors and take appropriate action. RBI barred Paytm Payments Bank from business. Byju Raveendran was removed from the board of Byju's.
